fields.Title: Voting on Empty? Gas Prices and Voting in Idaho
fields.Description/Abstract:
<p>Boise State University</p>
<p>This policy brief attempts to answer the question, "How much impact did gas prices have on voting in Idaho during the 2022 elections?" The answer, it turns out, is that gas prices had a mixed, but likely partisan and economically driven, effect on the vote. I will use as evidence to back this conclusion a series of questions from the recent Idaho Policy Survey, as well as a participant-observer study I have conducted for several years locally. I also have evidence from a national survey on which I had a question asked on gas prices and voting.</p>
